When this creature enters, target creature gains indestructible and lifelink until end of turn. Create a white Tag token. [i](It's a white enchantment with “{1}, Sacrifce this token: Add {W}”)[/i]

When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a non-battle permanent. If you do, take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with three defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]
